{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[compare]]; to [[contrast]]
# to [[liken]]; to [[draw]] an [[analogy]] to
# to [[emulate]]; to [[copy]]; to [[imitate]]
# to [[compete]]; to [[rival]]
# to [[match]]; to be [[equal]]
# to be the [[ratio]] of; ... [[to]] ...
# to [[gesticulate]]; to [[gesture]]
# [[comparison]]; [[juxtaposition]]; [[contrast]]
# [[metaphor]]; [[analogy]]
# [[ratio]]; [[proportion]]
# [[than]]; [[more]] ... [[than]]; [[-er]] [[compare]]d to
#: {{zh-x|她 比 我 高。|She is tall'''er''' than me.}}
#* {{zh-x|耶和華 神 對 蛇 說，你 既 作 了 這 事，就 必 受 咒詛，比 一切 的 牲畜{chù} 野獸 更 甚。|The Lord God said unto the serpent: “Because thou hast done this, thou art cursed '''above''' all cattle, and '''above''' every beast of the field.”}}
# {{zh-short|比利時|[[Belgium]]}}
